name: Extreme Bike - Tricky Master
description:
Are you a lover of real bike stunt games? If yes then try this crazy bike stunt game and complete your extreme stunt tasks in this stunt arena game. Now you have the choice to buy different stuntman bikes and you can have a ride in hurdles areas with extreme stunts

Features
- 3D amazing Dseign
- Real environment
- Number of stunning trickey tracks
- Real stunts and amazing motobike adventure in the street
- Real like character of stunt rider
- Amazing fantasy thrilling environment.
